sentences.english: This is similar to approaches also being considered at Heathrow.
sentences.chinese: 這個和希思羅機場所採用的方法是類似的。

sentences.english: Day 1 Arrive London Heathrow Airport. Transfer to Northampton.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦希思羅機場，送到北安普頓。

sentences.english: Heath the Luo airport is one of world biggest air harbors.
sentences.chinese: 希思羅機場是世界最大的航空港之一。

sentences.english: Victoria Beckham left Claridge's hotel in London, bound for Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲貝嫂離開克萊裏奇飯店，前往希思羅機場。

sentences.english: Swiss air flight 135 will take off from HeAThrow AT 7:30p. M.
sentences.chinese: 瑞航135班機將於下午7點半自希思羅機場起飛。

sentences.english: London Paddington has train connections to London Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦帕丁頓火車站與倫敦希思羅機場有火車連通。

sentences.english: Heathrow International Airport is a short bus or taxi ride away.
sentences.chinese: 乘小巴或出租汽車便可到達希思羅國際機場。

sentences.english: High winds forced planes to stack up over heathrow airport.
sentences.chinese: 強風迫使飛機在希思羅機場上空作定高分層盤旋。

sentences.english: Their rendezvous would be the Penta Hotel at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.chinese: 他們將在希思羅機場的五角飯店碰面。
